```{r}


library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
set.seed("18122022")
```


```{r}

n <- 1000

ganancias <- NULL
for (i in 1:n) {
  ganancias[i] <- sum(rbinom(366, size = 1, prob = 0.55))
}

promedio_ganancias <- sum(ganancias)/n


as.data.frame(ganancias) %>% ggplot() + geom_histogram(aes(x = ganancias), bins = 61, fill = "dodgerblue3") + labs(x = "Ganancias", y = "Conteo") + theme_bw()
```
